column6: Le suger? que [From.GetTitledFirstName] fuera ??el nuevo ??jefe de los cad?es de [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], y esper? con el aliento contenido mientras [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] lo pensaba.

column2: [Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap] accepted my candidate as Grand Judge!
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed my suggestion...
It felt preposterous, almost insulting, to suggest myself as the new Grand Judge for [From.GetTitledFirstName] but there were no better candidate I could have thought of than myself.
I am the new Grand Judge! Fear my justice!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not want me as Grand Judge
I imagined a situation which became more and more intimidating, with an outcome that could mean life or death. I swallowed hard and decided that I would...
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s choice for the Grand Judge position is disastrous! The man's judgement is severely distorted and there will be no justice as long as he holds the post!
Even this courtier would be better as Grand Judge!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] suggests a more suitable person for the post of Grand Judge
Why, even I would make a better Grand Judge!
I know a vassal of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] who would be better
Quench my anger and do nothing

Fuming with anger at what [From.GetTitledFirstName] called 'another disastrous judgement of your Grand Judge!', [From.GetTitledFirstName] suggested I would choose another person for the very important position as Grand Judge.
You are right, your courtier would be a better choice
The former Grand Judge, [This.GetTitledFirstName], is dismissed from the position
The new Grand Judge is [This.GetTitledFirstName]
I see no reason to dismiss the current Grand Judge
is disappointed [Root.GetTitledFirstName] did not follow [This.GetHerHis] recommendation for Grand Judge
I agree, you would make a better Grand Judge
This vassal of mine would make a better Grand Judge

The current Grand Judge is such a disastrous choice, with his arbitrary judgements and insufficient knowledge of the laws, that I had to suggest a new candidate for this position. [From.GetTitledFirstName] would make a much better Grand Judge and so I told [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and waited with bated breath as [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] pondered this.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is the new Grand Judge! Praise [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
I was dismissed and told not to interfere in this matter again

I inadvertently insulted the old Grand Judge when I suggested that I would make better judgements than he and knew the laws much better than him, but I saw no other way to get rid of him. After all, it was [From.GetTitledFirstName] who would judge if I was a better person for the position than the hopefully soon former Grand Judge.
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] destroy [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s house!

The Scriptures of the Prophets say: 'O you who believe! Intoxicants and games of chance and sacrificing to stones set up and dividing by arrows are only an uncleanness, the Shaitan's work, shun it therefore that you may be successful.' It is said that those who indulge in wine and other intoxicants will be punished by eighty lashes so they may know the wrongness of their path.
Eighty lashes for that drunkard!
is lashed eighty times by Grand Judge [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Show mercy and the drunkard may repent
The drunkard [This.GetTitledFirstName] is saved from the eighty lashes by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I stumbled drunkenly into Grand Judge [From.GetTitledFirstName] who smelled the wine I had drunk on my breath and ordered my arrest. The next day I got my punishment: eighty lashes!
The lashes made me cry out in pain...
I will never drink again, may [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] be my witness!
The wine will take the pain away...
Wine will never again touch my tongue!

The wine was aplenty and when I left my company I was more than unsteady on my feet. I must have drunk enough to become unconscious, for when I woke up it was in Grand Judge [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s room, who told me that if I donated a small sum of money to charity and promised to never drink again [From.GetSheHe] would let me go without punishment.
I promised but all I could think of was a can of wine to cure my headache
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] be my witness, I promise to never drink again!
